pkgmetadata.longdescription: Repository for NZ allocation and usage Python tools=============================================================This git repository contains the NZ allocation and usage Python tools and associated documentation... Documentation.. --------------.. The primary documentation for the package can be found `here <http://hilltop-py.readthedocs.io>`_.Installation------------nz-allo-usage-tools can be installed via pip or conda:: pip install nz-allo-usage-toolsor:: conda install -c mullenkamp nz-allo-usage-toolsThe main dependencies are `Pandas <http://pandas.pydata.org/pandas-docs/stable/>`_ and boto3.
